parameters.name: ConfigType
parameters.description:
Configuration type. Possible values:
- global: Global configuration.
- rule: Rule configuration.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: Page size, default is **500**, and the value range is **1~500**.

parameters.name: RuleName
parameters.description: Rule name, which can be used to find the rule with the specified name.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: Site ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~2850189~~) interface.

parameters.name: SiteVersion
parameters.description: Version number of the site configuration. For sites with version management enabled, you can use this parameter to specify the effective version of the site configuration, with the default being version 0.
